alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Central Colorado River Basin; Central Yampa River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; San Juan River Basin; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued May 30 at 1:58PM MDT until May 31 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. * WHERE...Central Yampa River Basin, Upper Yampa River Basin, Central Colorado River Basin, Four Corners/Upper Dolores River, Animas River Basin and San Juan River Basin. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Central Colorado River Basin; Central Yampa River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; San Juan River Basin; Upper Yampa River Basin
